entries.statement: Mireille has been blind since age twelve and tunes pianos by ear alone
The apartment is on the seventh floor of a Haussmann building in the 16th arrondissement
Composer Henri Vasseur died three weeks ago of cardiac arrest at his piano
Mireille always tunes the same Steinway Model D in apartment 7B
The sonata Vasseur was composing remains unfinished at measure 247

intent.message: Art outlives the artist, but at what cost to the living
intent.premise: A blind piano tuner discovers that one of her clients has been dead for weeks, yet someone in the apartment keeps requesting tunings and playing the same unfinished sonata.
intent.title: Le Dernier Accord
